reference-code.description: Any PK-12 student whose last school of enrollment was a public school in this school district.
Last school of enrollment was a public school in another district in the state.
Last school of enrollment was a private school in Florida.
Enrolling in a public school in this district after home education in any FL school district.
Any student entering PK or KG for the first time.
Enters a FL school from a country other than the US or a United States Commonwealth/Territory.
Last school of enrollment was a public school in another state or US common wealth/territory.
Last school of enrollment was a private school in another state, or a US common wealth/territory.
Enrolling in a pub. sch. in this dist. after home ed. in another state or US common wealth/ter.
The original entry of an adult student into this class.
Any PK-12 student who was received from another attendance reporting unit in the same school.
Any PK-12 student who was received from another school in the same district.
Unexpectedly reenters a school in the same district after withdrawing or being discharged.
Reentry of an adult student into the same class after withdrawal from that class for any reason
